misc.pingpong:
De prefix voor deze server is `{0}` en het help commando `{0}help`
Als je meer hulp nodig hebt, kun je de **[Support Server]({1})** joinen.
cooldown_msgs: Hebben je ouders je nooit verteld dat [geduld een schone zaak](http://www.patience-is-a-virtue.org/) is? Kalmeer en wacht nog **{}**.
Hey, je moet nog **{}** wachten voor je dat weer kan doen.
Hrmmm, het ziet eruit dat je nog **{}** moet wachten voordat je dat weer kan doen.
Weet je niet dat [geduld een schone zaak](http://www.patience-is-a-virtue.org/) is! Wacht nog **{}**.

errors.andioop: Oeps! Er ging iets helemaal mis... Kun je alsjeblieft een screenshot nemen en deze in de **[Support Server]({})** plaatsen? Dank je wel!
errors.private: Dit commando kan niet gebruikt worden in privé chat kanalen.
errors.gebruiker_perms: Leuk geprobeerd, maar je hebt niet voldoende permissies om dat te doen!
errors.bot_perms: Je hebt me de juiste permissies niet gegeven om dat te doen, slimmerd.
errors.concurrency: Wacht even! Je gebruikt dit command veeeel te snel!
errors.missing_arg: Het ziet eruit alsof je vergeet iets in te voeren!
errors.bad_arg: Het ziet eruit alsof je iets niet juist hebt ingevoerd, probeer het de volgende keer goed te typen graag.
errors.not_ready: Wacht een moment! Villager Bot is nog aan het opstarten!
errors.nrn_buddy: Wacht even, je kan dit commando op het moment nog niet gebruiken!
errors.disabled: Dit commando is in deze server uitgeschakeld en kan niet gebruikt worden!

tips: Heb je een suggestie? Een bug gevonden? Hulp nodig? Wil je handelen? Kom in de Support Server! https://discord.gg/39DwwUV
Heb je smaragden nodig? Stem voor ons op top.gg! https://top.gg/bot/639498607632056321
Blut door al die plunderaars? Stem voor ons om smaragden te krijgen! https://top.gg/bot/639498607632056321
Check het `rules` commando om de Villager Bot regels te zien!
Ben je eigenaar van een Minecraft server of ben je er naar een op zoek? Check https://minecraft.global/
tip_intros: **Hoe wordt je een god gamer tip #1:**

body: Hey jullie! Typ `{prefix}help` om te starten met Villager Bot!
Als je meer hulp nodig hebt, check de **[Support Server]({support_server})**!
intro.footer: Gemaakt door Iapetus11 en anderen ({prefix}credits)  |  Check de {prefix}rules

main.desc:
Meer hulp nodig? Check de **[Support Server]({})**!
Geniet je van de bot? Stem voor ons op **[top.gg]({})** en verdien smaragden!
main.howto: Doe `{0}help <commando>` om te zien hoe je dat commando gebruikt!
main.nodoc: Geen documentatie bestaat voor dat commando.

econ.profile: `{0}profile [optioneel: gebruiker]` *laat het profiel van jou of een opgegeven gebruiker zien*
econ.balance: `{0}balance [optioneel: gebruiker]` *laat het saldo van jou of een opgegeven gebruiker zien*
econ.inventory: `{0}inventory [optioneel: categorie] [optioneel: gebruiker]` *laat het inventaris van jou of een gekozen gebruiker zien; optionele categorieën bevatten `tools`, `magic`, `fish`, of `misc`*
econ.withdraw: `{0}withdraw <smaragden blokken>` *trek smaragden uit je bank terug*
econ.give: `{0}give <gebruiker> <hoeveelheid> <item>` *geef een andere gebruiker een item of smaragden*
econ.farm: `{0}farm` *plant en oogst gewassen die smaragden waard zijn*
econ.trash: `{0}trash` *bekijk de nutteloze items die je hebt gemijnd*
econ.gamble: `{0}gamble <smaragden>` *gok met de bot om kans te maken op smaragden*
econ.buy: `{0}buy [optioneel: hoeveelheid van een item] <item>` *koop een item van de Villager Shop*
econ.trivia: `{0}trivia` *stuurt triviavragen die je kunt beantwoorden voor smaragden!*
econ.dailyquest: `{0}dailyquest` *geeft je een leuke zoektocht die binnen een dag verloopt*
econ.iteminfo: `{0}iteminfo <item>` *verstuurt informatie en statistieken over het opgegeven item*

mc.mcstatus: `{0}mcstatus [optioneel: server]` *checkt de status van elk type Minecraft-server*
mc.rcon: `{0}rcon <command>` *voert opdrachten uit op een Minecraft-server vanaf Discord*
mc.randommc: `{0}randommc` *toont een willekeurige Minecraft-server als je een nieuwe plek wilt om te verkennen*
mc.blockify: `{0}blockify` *verandert elke afbeelding die je uploadt in Minecraft-blokken / pixelkunst*
mc.stealskin: `{0}stealskin <gebruikersnaam>` *pakt de skin van een Minecraft Java Edition-speler*
mc.buildidea: `{0}buildidea` *stuurt een willekeurig bouwidee voor als je je verveelt en inspiratie nodig hebt*
mc.mccolors: `{0}mccolors` *laat de Minecraft-kleuren zien en hoe ze te gebruiken in de ingame chat*
mc.mcprofile: `{0}mcprofile <gebruikersnaam>` *toont informatie over een Minecraft Java Edition-speler*
mc.nametoxuid: `{0}nametoxuid <gebruikersnaam>` *verandert een MC Bedrock Edition gamertag in een xuid*

util.rules: `{0}rules` *bekijk de regels voor het gebruik van de bot*
util.config: `{0}config` *configureer / stel de bot naar wens in*
util.ping: `{0}ping` *geeft de latentie weer tussen Discord en Villager Bot*
util.avatar: `{0}avatar` *laat de vergrote avatar zien van de opgegeven gebruiker*
util.links: `{0}links` *kijk nuttige links met betrekking tot Villager Bot*
util.vote: `{0}vote` *verdien smaragden door op Villager Bot te stemmen op bepaalde websites*
util.image: `{0}image <search>` *zoekt op google afbeeldingen voor uw zoekopdracht*
util.credits: `{0}credits`` *laat zien wie heeft geholpen bij het maken van Villager Bot*
util.snipe: `{0}snipe` *laat het laatst verwijderde bericht in het huidige kanaal zien*
util.redditdl: `{0}redditdl <reddit post url>` *downloadt de opgegeven media van Reddit*
util.imagetopng: `{0}imagetopng *converteert de geüploade/gespecificeerde afbeelding naar een png*
util.translate: `{0}translate <doel> [tekst]` *vertaalt de opgegeven tekst of het opgegeven bericht naar de opgegeven doeltaal*
util.reminders: `{0}reminders` `add` *of* `remove` *om respectievelijk een herinnering toe te voegen of te verwijderen*

fun.comic: `{0}comic` *verstuurd een random strip van r/comics op reddit*
fun.say: `{0}say <tekst>` *zorgt ervoor dat de bot de tekst zegt die je invoert*
fun.enchant: `{0}enchant <tekst>` *veranderd tekst in de Minecraft betoveringstafel taal*
fun.unenchant: `{0}unenchant <tekst>` *veranderd de betoveringstafel taal terug naar tekst*
fun.sarcastic: `{0}sarcastic <text>` *vErAnDeRd TeKsT iN dE sPoNgEbOb SaRcAsTiScHe TeKsT*
fun.kill: `{0}kill <gebruiker>` *vermoord een andere gebruiker op brute wijze*
fun.bubblewrap: `{0}bubblewrap` *geeft een virtueel bubbelpapier om te poppen*
fun.coinflip: `{0}coinflip` *gooit een munt op en zegt het resultaat in de chat*
fun.achievement: `{0}achievement <text>` *genereerd een Minecraft vooruitgang met de gegeven tekst*
fun.splashtext: `{0}splashtext <text>` *genereerd een Minecraft splash scherm met de gegeven tekst*
fun.trivia: `{0}trivia` *sends trivia questions you can answer for emeralds!*

mod.warn: `{0}warn <gebruiker> [optioneel: reden]` *waarschuw een gebruiker voor een gegeven reden*
mod.warns: `{0}warns <gebruiker>` *bekijk de waarschuwingen die een gebruiker heeft, laat leeg om jouw waarschuwingen te zien*
mod.delwarns: `{0}delwarns <gebruiker>` *verwijderd de waarschuwingen die de gebruiker heeft in deze server*
mod.kick: `{0}kick <gebruiker> [optioneel: reden]` *kickt de gebruiker van de huidige Discord server*
mod.ban: `{0}ban <gebruiker> [optioneel: verwijder berichtdagen] [optioneel: reden]` *verbant de gebruiker van de huidige Discord server*
mod.pardon: `{0}pardon <gebruiker>` *maak de verbanning van een gebruiker van de huidige Discord server ongedaan*
mod.mute: `{0}mute <gebruiker> [tijd] [reden]` *dempt de gebruiker in de huidige Discord server*
mod.unmute: `{0}unmute <gebruiker>` *maakt de demping van een gebruiker in de huidige Discord server ongedaan*

fun.too_long: Dat bericht zou te lang zijn om te converteren.

bubblewrap.invalid_size_1: Dat is geen geschikte grootte. Voorbeeld van een geschikte grootte: `10x10`
bubblewrap.invalid_size_2: De grootte moet tussen de 1 en 12 zijn

trivia.time_to_answer: Je hebt 15 secondes om deze vraag te beantwoorden!
trivia.timeout: Je hebt geen tijd meer over!
correct:

Je bent met {}{} beloond!

Je hebt {}{} ontvangen!

Nice, dat was **correct**!
Je hebt {}{} verdient!

Nice, dat was **correct**!
Je bent met {}{} beloont!

Ja dokter, hij heeft eigenlijk geen brein...

config.invalid: That is not a valid option. (Valid options are: {})

main.title: Villager Bot Settings
guild_content:
`{0}config prefix <new prefix>` - Change the command prefix in this server.

`{0}config replies <on/off>` - Change if bot should respond to messages like "emeralds".

`{0}config difficulty <peaceful/easy/hard>` - Changes the difficulty of the game.

`{0}config lang <language>` - Changes the language of Villager Bot.

`{0}config mcserver <mcserver>` - Changes the server that is pinged if you don't specify a server in `/mcping`.

`{0}config togglecmd <cmd>` - Change whether the specified command can be used or not.
gebruiker_content:
`{0}config giftalert <on/off>` - Change whether bot tells you if you've been given items or emeralds.

`{0}config clearrconpasswords` - Clear your saved remote console passwords from the database.

prefix.this_server: The prefix in this server is `{}`
prefix.error_1: You cannot have a prefix longer than `{}` characters.
prefix.error_2: `{}` is not allowed to be in a prefix.

cmd.not_prem: This feature is not enabled in this server.

rcon.none: You didn't have any saved passwords.

rules.penalty: Penalty for breaking these rules may include a reset/wipe, in-game penalty/debuff, or a **permanent ban from the support server and/or using the bot**.
rules.rule_1: **1.** Don't abuse bugs, report them in the #support channel on the [support server]({}) for a reward!
rules.rule_2: **2.** Don't cheat in any way or use alternate accounts or other gebruikers for storing your emeralds or items. (This includes no self-botting.)
rules.rule_3: **3.** Don't be annoying, toxic, or harrass anyone using the bot's features.
rules.rule_4: **4.** Don't use the bot to promote any content not sanctioned by the bot owner.

remind.reminder_max: You cannot have more than {max} reminders at once.
remind.stupid_1: You used invalid formatting, example: `{0}remindme 1w2d3h4m this is an example` will remind you in one week, two days, three hours, and four minutes.
remind.time_max: You cannot set a reminder for more than one year in advance.
remind.reminder: {0}, you wanted me to remind you: *{1}*
remind.add: You can add reminders with {}reminder add <duration> <text>

credits.credits: Villager Bot wouldn't be possible without...

people.iapetus11: The creator, owner, and developer of Villager Bot
people.hpancakesk: Helped come up with the original ideas behind Villager Bot
people.moody: Helped with the ideas behind several items and fishing
people.emulator: Helped with bug fixes and feature additions
people.elrynd: Has helped with bug fixes and code understanding, and translated Villager Bot into French
people.chez: Created new features and helps fix bugs
people.quack: Helps fix minor issues with the code and translations
people.zelou: Helps with the Spanish translation of Villager Bot
people.joaooh: Created and maintains the Portuguese translation of Villager Bot
people.xe: Minor bug fixes and feature additions
people.radar: Minor bug fixes and feature additions
people.kuro: Helps with multiple translations of Villager Bot
people.hilt: Helps with multiple translations of Villager Bot
people.infernum: Miscellaneous bug fixes and feature additions and reminders system improvements

credits.others: And of course, the countless others who have contributed ideas and bug reports to help make Villager Bot better!

redditdl.reddit_error: Uh oh, something went wrong contacting Reddit

imgcmds.missing: You must specify the url of an image or upload one.
imgcmds.too_big: The specified image is too big (must not exceed {size}).
imgcmds.error: An error occurred while reading the specified image.

exif.title: EXIF Data
exif.discord: This command requires a URL, as Discord automatically strips EXIF data from media.

translate.stupid_1: You must either send text to translate or reply to a message to translate.
translate.stupid_2: The message replied to must have text to translate.
translate.stupid_3: Unknown or invalid target language, only these are supported: {lang_codes}

econ.use_a_number_stupid: You have to use a number.

bot_prevention.problem: Please type the letters below to continue:
bot_prevention.timeout: You ran out of time, what a slowpoke...

pp.bot_1: Hey dumb dumb, Villager Bot has wayyy to much stuff to show here.
pp.bot_2: Hey dumb dumb, bots don't have rights and therefore can't have items or emeralds.

bal.bot_1: Villager Bot has wayyyyy too many emeralds to show!
bal.bot_2: Bots don't have rights and can't have emeralds or stuff.

inv.bot_1: Villager Bot has wayyyyy too many items to show (About 100000000000000000)
inv.bot_2: Bots don't have rights and therefore can't have emeralds or stuff.

dep.poor_loser: You don't have enough emeralds to deposit.
dep.stupid_1: You can't deposit less than one emerald block.
dep.stupid_2: You don't have enough space for that.
dep.stupid_3: You can't deposit more emeralds than you have.

withd.poor_loser: You don't have enough emerald blocks to withdraw.
withd.stupid_1: You can't withdraw less than one emerald block.
withd.stupid_2: You can't withdraw more than you have.

shop.embed_footer: Use {}inventory to see what you have!

buy.poor_loser_1: You don't have enough emeralds to buy any of this item.
buy.stupid_1: You can't buy less than one of an item.
buy.stupid_2: `{}` is invalid or isn't in the Villager Shop.
buy.poor_loser_2: You don't have enough emeralds to buy `{}x` **{}**.
buy.need_total_of: You need a total of `{}x` {} ({}) to buy this item.
buy.you_done_bought: You have bought {}x **{}** for {} (You have {} total).
buy.no_to_item_1: You can't buy any more of this item.
buy.no_to_item_2: For some reason, you can't buy this item.

sell.invalid_item: Either that item is invalid or you don't have it.
sell.stupid_1: You can't sell more than you have of that item.
sell.stupid_2: You can't sell less than one of an item.
sell.you_done_sold: You have sold {}x **{}** for a total of {}{}

give.bot_1: Villager Bot already has a full inventory (About 100000000000000000 unique items!)
give.bot_2: You can't give stuff to bots as they don't have rights and can't have emeralds or stuff.
give.stupid_1: You can't give stuff to yourself!
give.stupid_2: You can't give someone less than one of something.
give.stupid_3: You can't give someone more emeralds than you have.
give.stupid_4: You can't give more of an item than you have.

gamble.stupid_1: You can't gamble more emeralds than you have.
gamble.stupid_2: You have to gamble 10 or more emeralds at a time.
gamble.stupid_3: You can't gamble more than 50000 emeralds at a time.
gamble.too_rich: You have too much emeralds, go do something else with your life!
gamble.tie: Tie! Maybe Villager Bot will steal your emeralds anyways...

lb.title: __**Villager Bot Leaderboards**__
lb.no_item_lb: No leaderboard exists for this item

trash.how_to_empty: Use `{prefix}trashcan empty` to empty the trash!
trash.emptied_for: You emptied your trash can for {reward}

daily_quests.cant_reroll: You can't re-roll your quest yet, if you think this is a bug please report it

description: When mining, has a `5/26` chance of mining up emeralds. Upgrade to a **Stone Pickaxe** to receive better voting rewards.
When mining, has a `6/26` chance of mining up emeralds. Upgrade to an **Iron Pickaxe** to receive better voting rewards.
When mining, has a `7/26` chance of mining up emeralds. Upgrade to a **Gold Pickaxe** to receive better voting rewards.
When mining, has a `9/26` chance of mining up emeralds. Upgrade to a **Diamond Pickaxe** to receive better voting rewards.
When mining, has a `11/26` chance of mining up emeralds. Upgrade to a **Netherite Pickaxe** to receive better voting rewards.
When mining, has a `13/26` chance of mining up emeralds.
Deals a base damage of `1-2hp` against mobs.
Deals a base damage of `1-3hp` against mobs.
Deals a base damage of `2-4hp` against mobs.
Deals a base damage of `4-5hp` against mobs.
Deals a base damage of `6-7hp` against mobs.
Deals a base damage of `7-10hp` against mobs.
Allows you to plant up to `10 plots` of farmland using the `{prefix}farm` command.
Allows you to plant up to `20 plots` of farmland using the `{prefix}farm` command.
Allows you to plant up to `30 plots` of farmland using the `{prefix}farm` command.
Allows you to plant up to `40 plots` of farmland using the `{prefix}farm` command.
Allows you to plant up to `50 plots` of farmland using the `{prefix}farm` command.
Allows you to plant up to `60 plots` of farmland using the `{prefix}farm` command.
Allows you to fish for **Cod**, **Salmon**, **Tropical Fish**, **Pufferfish**, **Rainbow Trout**, **Gold Fish**, and **Emerald Fish** using the `{prefix}fish` command.
Use this item with the `{prefix}use Vault Potion` command to increase your available `{prefix}vault` capacity.
Reduces the `{prefix}mine` command cooldown by `1 second` for `7 minutes`.
Reduces the `{prefix}mine` command cooldown by `2 seconds` for `6 minutes`.
Increases the emerald reward from the `{prefix}mine` command by `1-2 emeralds`.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new pickaxes. This enchantment book does not stack.
Increases the emerald reward from the `{prefix}mine` command by `1-3 emeralds`.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new pickaxes. This enchantment book does not stack.
Increases the emerald reward from the `{prefix}mine` command by `1-4 emeralds`.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new pickaxes. This enchantment book does not stack.
Increases base sword damage by `25%` (for a total of `125%`) when fighting mobs.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new swords. This enchantment book does not stack.
Increases base sword damage by `50%` (for a total of `150%`) when fighting mobs.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new swords. This enchantment book does not stack.

Upon using the item with the `{prefix}use Time Pearl` command, it fast-forwards time by two days; growing crops, resetting cooldowns for `{prefix}honey`, `{prefix}pillage`, `{prefix}search`, clears all active effects (for example, haste) and consumes the item.
Using this item with the `{prefix}use Shield Pearl` command will allow you to prevent people from pillaging you with the `{prefix}pillage` for up to one month. Using this item will consume it.
If you use the `{prefix}pillage` command while a **Shield Pearl** is active, its effect will be cancelled and you will become pillageable.

With a **Rich Person Trophy**, you get a bonus to the `{prefix}gamble` command, `200%` emeralds from the `{prefix}trashcan empty` command, `150%` emeralds from opening **Barrel**s, and `200%` emeralds from the `{prefix}mine` command. But remember... **greed has a price**...
Purchasing **Jar Of Bees** from the `{prefix}shop` allows you to harvest honey from them daily using the `{prefix}honey` command.
Allows you to transform a **Slime Ball** into a **Beaker Of Slime** with the `{prefix}use <hoeveelheid> Glass Beaker` command, allowing it to be traded with other players.
This item is required when purchasing certain items from the `{prefix}shop`.
Having this item in your inventory decreases your chances of missing attacks against **Baby Slime**s.
Having this item in your inventory decreases your chances of fishing up junk when using the `{prefix}fish` command.
You can plant a **Wheat Seed** using the `{prefix}farm plant <hoeveelheid> Wheat Seed` command to grow `1-2` **Wheat**.
You can plant a **Carrot** using the `{prefix}farm plant <hoeveelheid> Carrot` command to grow `1-3` **Carrot**s.
You can plant a **Potato** using the `{prefix}farm plant <hoeveelheid> Potato` command to grow `1-3` **Potato**es.
You can plant a **Melon Seed** using the `{prefix}farm plant <hoeveelheid> Melon Seed` command to grow `2-5` **Melon**.
You can plant a **Chorus Seed** using the `{prefix}farm plant <hoeveelheid> Chorus Seed` command to grow `1-2` **Chorus Fruit**.

Dropped from killing Skeletons with a chance of `1/20` (affected by looting enchantments). You can use this item with the `{prefix}use Bone Meal` command, which grows all crops by `67%` of the time they take to grow.
Can be found by emptying your trash can with `{prefix}trash` command if you have enough dirt.

When used with the `{prefix}use Fishing Bait` command, it reduces the wait time for the `{prefix}fish` command by `8 seconds` and increases the chances of fishing up fish instead of junk or collectibles.
When used with the `{prefix}use <hoeveelheid> Honey Jar` command, it will heal you `1/2hp` per **Honey Jar**.
When used with the `{prefix}use <hoeveelheid> Barrel` command, it will give you a reward of either emeralds or a collectible item.
When used with the `{prefix}use <hoeveelheid> Beaker Of Slime` command, it will separate out into a **Slime Ball** and **Glass Beaker**.
Allows you to change (re-roll) your daily quest with the `{prefix}use Infernum's Scroll` command. Using this item consumes it.
This item drops from all mobs with a chance of about `1/40` (affected by looting enchantments).
Reduces `4 seconds` of wait time from the `{prefix}fish` command.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory. This enchantment book does not stack.
Increases chances and quantities of recovered items and emeralds from slain mobs.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new swords. This enchantment book does not stack.
Increases chances and quantities of recovered items and emeralds from slain mobs, more so than the **Looting I Book**.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new swords. This enchantment book does not stack.
Reduces the cooldown on the `{prefix}mine` command by `0.5 seconds`.
This enchantment book is applied automatically as long as it remains in your inventory, and also transfers to all new pickaxes. This enchantment book does not stack.
> When used with the `{prefix}chug Luck Potion` command you will experience the effects listed below for `4 minutes and 30 seconds`.

Significantly increases chances of:
- Obtaining extra vault spaces while running economy commands.
- Finding collectibles from mining.
- Finding fishing bait when emptying the `{prefix}trashcan`.

Significantly decreases chances of:
- Fishing up junk (instead of collectibles or fish).
- Losing bees when using the `{prefix}honey` command.
When present in your inventory, it doubles the emerald reward from emptying your `{prefix}trashcan`.
Dropped from killing Baby Slimes with a chance of `1/25` (affected by looting enchantments). This item can be used to purchase the **Slime Trophy** and can be traded using **Glass Beaker**s.
Dropped from killing Endermen with a chance of `1/30` (affected by looting enchantments). This item can be used to purchase various items in the `{prefix}shop`.
When present in your inventory, it increases the emeralds won from gambling and aids in protecting you from successful pillages.
This item awards a special role in the Villager Bot Support Server

item_bible.not_found: No item with the name can be found. This item could exist, but no one has it and there's no documentation for it.
